meanings.definition: A small roll of minced meat or fish, fried in breadcrumbs.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a delicious croquette at the party.
meanings.sent2: My mom makes the best croquettes for dinner.
meanings.sent3: The croquette rolled off the plate and onto the floor!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a warm croquette on a cold day.
meanings.sent5: The golden croquette sizzled in the frying pan.

meanings.definition: A small cake or ball of minced food, fried in breadcrumbs.
meanings.sent1: The croquette was crispy on the outside and soft inside.
meanings.sent2: I ordered a croquette as an appetizer at the restaurant.
meanings.sent3: The croquette looked like a tiny edible ball.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as delightful as a freshly cooked croquette.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the croquette filled the kitchen.
